name: FlightTrainingTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Chris Dunn is the flying weatherman. He offers tips on learning to fly with an emphasis on the weather aspect of aviation. These helpful segments are not intended to replace actual flight instruction, only augment what student pilots learn from their CFI.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
